vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπῐθύω,
(θύω A) sacrifice upon, [Refs]; sacrifice besides or after, τέλεον νεαροῖς ἐπιθύσας 4th-5th c.BC: Aeschylus Tragicus “Agamemnon” 1504; ἐπὶ δ᾽ ἔθυσα μητέρα 5th c.BC: Euripides Tragicus “Orestes” 562:—middle, Νέρωνι Τάλβαν ἐ. [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II. burn incense, [LXX+1st c.BC+]: generally, offer on, ἐπὶ τοῦ βωμοῦ τὰς δεκάτας 1st c.BC: Dionysius Halicarnassensis 1.40 codices
